answers.answer: Burping can be a side effect of your medication for diabetes, Have you changed it recently? What are you taking?.Are you in statin treatment for the cholesterol? Some may produce chest pain as side effect.Jesus

question: I am a 32yr female with Type 2 diabetes my cholesterol is a bit high and my HDL (good cholesterol is almost nonexistence) and my BP is general low (110/67); four nights ago I went to the ER because I was having pains in my chest, difficulty getting air into my lungs and dizziness.  When they did my BP it was 136/96 my BP did eventual go down on its own.  At the hospital they did blood work, EKG and a chest x-ray everything was fine...I am still having difficulty getting air into my lungs, dizziness and occasional chest pains I have also started burping A LOT.  At night I am waking up in a cold sweat.  What could be wrong with me???
title: help
